summary: This document contains three consecutive daily lieutenant's logs from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, covering August 9-10, 2019. The logs detail routine prison operations and, most significantly, record the medical emergency and death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein on the morning of August 10, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Inmate #76318-054 who was found unresponsive in his cell (Z06-220) on the morning of August 10, 2019, leading to a medical emergency, CPR, and transport to a local hospital.

persons.name: Lt. M. Cannata
persons.context: Relieved the Day Watch Operations Lieutenant of duties on August 9, 2019, at 4:00 PM.

events.title: Death of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) was found unresponsive in his cell (Z06-220) at approximately 6:33 AM. CPR was initiated, 911 was called, EMS arrived, and he was transported to a local hospital with CPR still in progress.

events.title: Epstein placed in special housing (dry cell)
events.description: An inmate (presumably Epstein, based on context and log sequence) was transferred to special housing (dry cell) at 3:58 PM.

events.title: Epstein transferred to psych observation
events.description: An inmate was transferred to special housing (psych observation) at 7:24 PM on August 10, which is after the recorded time of his death earlier that morning. This may be a log entry error or refer to a different inmate.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was found unresponsive in his cell (Z06-220) at 6:33 AM on August 10, 2019.
CPR was performed and 911 was called. EMS arrived at 6:43 AM and transported Epstein to a local hospital with CPR still in progress at 7:10 AM.
The logs show Epstein was on "psych observation" with an inmate companion and was in a "dry cell" prior to his death.
The prison's fire alarm and public address systems were reported as malfunctioning during the shifts recorded.
The document is an official Bureau of Prisons log, providing a timeline of the immediate circumstances surrounding Epstein's death.
